ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( BEGINS(RecordType.Name, "Staff") , OR( Aria_Tfl__pc==true, ISPICKVAL(Aria_Company__pc,"TFL")), OR( ISBLANK( Aria_Person_Id__c ),AND( LEFT(Aria_Person_Id__c, 6)<>"TFL005", LEFT(Aria_Person_Id__c, 6)<>"TFL001"), AND(LEN(Aria_Person_Id__c)<>15) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For all TFL staff, Aria Person ID should start with 'TFL001' or 'TFL005' and contain 12 digits after 'TFL'.
